hero.title:
AI Should Be Free.
AI Should Be Private.
AI Should Be Yours.
hero.subtitle: We're not just building software. We're fighting for a future where artificial intelligence serves humanity - not the other way around. Where your data remains yours. Where powerful technology doesn't come with a surveillance price tag.

manifesto.block1_text: The AI revolution is happening, but it's happening on someone else's terms. Every major AI service requires you to upload your data to corporate servers. Your voice recordings, your documents, your most private content - stored, analyzed, and monetized by companies whose interests don't align with yours.
manifesto.block2_text: We build AI tools that run entirely on your device. No cloud. No accounts. No data collection. Just powerful, open-source software that respects your privacy and works offline. When you use our products, your data stays exactly where it belongs - with you.
manifesto.commitment1_desc: All our products will always have fully-functional free versions. No trials. No feature walls. No subscription traps.
manifesto.commitment2_desc: Your data never leaves your device. No telemetry. No analytics. No exceptions.
manifesto.commitment3_desc: Our code is MIT licensed. Audit it. Fork it. Build on it. The mission is bigger than any single project.

privacy.short_text: We don't collect your data. Every Svetozar Technologies product runs 100% locally on your device. Your files, text, audio, and documents never touch our servers — because we don't have servers. That's not a feature. It's our founding principle.
privacy.s1_text: At Svetozar Technologies, we believe privacy is a fundamental right, not a premium feature. We build AI tools that work entirely on your device because that's how software should work. No accounts. No cloud processing. No data collection. Ever.
privacy.s2_intro: This policy applies to all Svetozar Technologies desktop applications, including LocalMind (audio transcription), LocalWrite (AI writing assistant), and LocalPDF (PDF intelligence). Every application:
privacy.s2_item1: Processes 100% locally: All AI processing — transcription, writing, summarization, PDF analysis — happens entirely on your device.
privacy.s2_item2: Collects zero telemetry: We do not collect usage statistics, crash reports, performance metrics, or any form of analytics from our apps.
privacy.s2_item3: Makes no network calls: After the initial AI model download, all applications work completely offline.
privacy.s2_item4: Requires no account: You never need to create an account or provide personal information to use any of our products.
privacy.s2_item5: Keeps your files local: All outputs — transcriptions, documents, reports, and exports — are stored only on your device.
privacy.s3_intro: When you visit our website (svetozar-technologies.github.io), we use Plausible Analytics, a privacy-first analytics service:
privacy.s3_item1: No cookies: Plausible does not use cookies or track you across websites.
privacy.s3_item2: No personal data: We cannot identify individual visitors.
privacy.s3_item3: GDPR compliant: All data is anonymized and aggregated.
privacy.s3_extra: We collect only basic anonymous metrics like page views and referral sources to understand how people discover our products. Nothing personally identifiable.
privacy.s4_intro: Our website and applications do NOT use:
privacy.s4_item1: Google Analytics or any invasive analytics
privacy.s5_intro: If you voluntarily provide your email address for product updates:
privacy.s5_item1: 100% opt-in: Email collection is always voluntary. You can download and use all products without providing any personal information.
privacy.s5_item2: Stored securely: Emails are handled via Formspree, a privacy-focused form service.
privacy.s5_item3: Limited use: We only send infrequent notifications about major product releases, new features, and security updates.
privacy.s5_item4: Never shared: We will never sell, rent, or share your email with third parties.
privacy.s5_item5: Easy unsubscribe: Every email includes a one-click unsubscribe link.
privacy.s6_text: Our applications do not integrate with third-party services that could compromise your privacy. The only external dependency is the initial AI model download, which comes directly from Hugging Face, a trusted open-source model repository. After that, everything runs offline.
privacy.s7_text1: Desktop applications: Since all data stays on your device, security is determined by your operating system's built-in protections (e.g., FileVault on macOS, BitLocker on Windows).
privacy.s7_text2: Website: This site is served over HTTPS. Any form submissions are encrypted in transit.
privacy.s8_intro: If you've provided your email address, you have the right to:
privacy.s8_item1: Access: Request a copy of any data we hold (limited to your email).
privacy.s8_item2: Deletion: Request immediate removal from our email list.
privacy.s8_item3: Portability: Receive your data in a machine-readable format.
privacy.s8_item4: Correction: Update your email address at any time.
privacy.s8_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: kaivalya.pandey@gmail.com
privacy.s9_intro: All Svetozar Technologies products are open source under the MIT license. You can:
privacy.s9_item1: Audit every line of code to verify our privacy claims across all repositories.
privacy.s9_item2: Verify network behavior — confirm our applications make no unauthorized network calls.
privacy.s9_item3: Build from source — compile any application yourself for maximum trust.
privacy.s9_item4: Modify freely — adapt the code to meet your specific privacy requirements.
privacy.s10_text: Our products are not directed at children under 13. However, since we collect no personal data through our desktop applications, they can be safely used by people of all ages.
privacy.s11_intro: We may update this privacy policy as we release new products or features. Material changes will be announced via:
privacy.s11_extra: Our core commitment — that your data stays on your device — will never change.
privacy.s12_intro: Questions about our privacy practices? Reach out through any of these channels:
privacy.promise_text:
Desktop apps: Zero data collection. Everything stays on your device.
Website: Privacy-first analytics. No cookies. No personal data.
Email: Opt-in only. No spam. Easy unsubscribe.
Always: We will never compromise your privacy for profit.
